channel.title: [PI]How can i add rights to objects, like only staff can use the object
channel.description: I have a PI source, and i want the curse prayer altar to be able to be used by normal players, as its set as staff only, please help

item.title: [PI]How can i add rights to objects, like only staff can use the object
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“eballer48, post:3, topic:414690”][quote author=adamb292 link=topic=516653.msg3750947#msg3750947 date=1316036063]
I have a PI source, and i want the curse prayer altar to be able to be used by normal players, as its set as staff only, please help
[/quote]

spawn the object normally thru objectmanajer.java
then i actionhandler.java under first click object add

case obid
if(obX == && obY == && c.playerRights == ) {
do this
} else if (obX == && obY == && c.playerRights == 0) { <-- might ba ; actually idk
c.sendMessage(“You need to be staff to do this”);
}[/quote]

it’s not a “;” because you have to have the same amount of } as you do {

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]How can i add rights to objects, like only staff can use the object

item.title: [PI]How can i add rights to objects, like only staff can use the object
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

adamb292:

I have a PI source, and i want the curse prayer altar to be able to be used by normal players, as its set as staff only, please help

spawn the object normally thru objectmanajer.java
then i actionhandler.java under first click object add

case obid
if(obX == && obY == && c.playerRights == ) {
do this
} else if (obX == && obY == && c.playerRights == 0) { <-- might ba ; actually idk
c.sendMessage(“You need to be staff to do this”);
}
